scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 DISABLE_OPENCOLLECTIVE=1 CI=true next build --no-lint
scripts.build:standard: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 DISABLE_OPENCOLLECTIVE=1 next build --no-lint
scripts.build:debug: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096 --inspect" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 DISABLE_OPENCOLLECTIVE=1 next build --no-lint
